ingredients.ingredient: 3 ½ gallons peanut oil for frying
1 (10 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed
1 tablespoon ground black pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Ensure turkey is completely dry before frying to prevent oil splattering
Monitor oil temperature carefully to maintain 350°F for crispy results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through safely deep frying a turkey with proper oil temperature and timing
